items.sentence: Tom grew up near a lake, but he isn\'t a good swimmer.
Tom\'s birthday is in October and mine is in November.
We won\'t be able to get to the bank before it closes.
You don\'t have to speak to Tom if you don\'t want to.
Tom wants to know why Mary didn\'t go to school today.
I think it\'s time for me to put new bait on the hook.
I thought you said Tom didn\'t live in Boston anymore.
This house is large enough for your family to live in.
This is a good opportunity to get to know one another.
This is considered an upper-middle-class neighborhood.
